next.title: COVID-19 has changed where and how people shop - what do you think will stick post-pandemic? Answer by @brian_dammeir, President of North America at @Adyen. https://t.co/pD6sjUnoHt https://t.co/IO1kMDx3o8

localize.full_text: COVID-19已经改变了人们购物的地点和方式--你认为流行病后会坚持什么？回答者为@brian_dammeir，@Adyen的北美总裁。https://t.co/pD6sjUnoHt https://t.co/IO1kMDx3o8。
